TopicTitle: HUGE Assault Frigate VS the VAB (NEW EXPLOSIONS ARE AWESOME)

Articles.Content:
When I first saw the new explosions, I was doubtful because they didn't have that rocket fuel explosion look to them, it looked more like burning gasoline.

In testing my new battleship - an Assault Frigate, designed from an old game called "Homeworld" - I was proven wrong, the new explosions are amazing.

So is smashing into the VAB.

I was originally going to add in music much more of an epic hardcore sound, but the quirkiness and eventual epicness of the patriotic American song "Stars and Stripes forever" fit it way more.

Yes I know the gravity is off. But that Assault Frigate doesn't go anywhere with it on.

Original post about this Assault Frigate:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97136-Homeworld-Tiiadan-Assault-Frigate

Hope you enjoy!
